mapper.select: SELECT A.BILL_SEQ, A.BILL_NUM, A.BILL_CORP_NAME, A.BILL_ADDR, A.BILL_TEL, A.BILL_USER_ID, A.CENTER_CD, B.CENTER_NM, FN_DETAILCODENM(A.BILL_DVSN) AS BILL_DVSN_TEXT FROM TSER_BILL_INFO_I A, TSEB_CENTER_INFO_M B WHERE A.CENTER_CD = #{centerCd} AND A.CENTER_CD = B.CENTER_CD

SELECT A.BILLDAY_CD, A.BILL_DAY, A.BILL_SEQ, CASE A.BILL_DAY WHEN '2' THEN '월요일' WHEN '3' THEN '화요일' WHEN '4' THEN '수요일' WHEN '5' THEN '목요일' WHEN '6' THEN '금요일' WHEN '7' THEN '토요일' WHEN '1' THEN '일요일' END BILL_DAY_TEXT, B.BILL_DVSN, FN_DETAILCODENM(B.BILL_DVSN) AS BILL_DVSN_TEXT, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_DTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS LAST_UPDT_DTM, C.CENTER_NM FROM TESR_BILLDAY_INFO_I A, TSER_BILL_INFO_I B, TSEB_CENTER_INFO_M C WHERE A.CENTER_CD = #{centerCd} AND A.CENTER_CD = C.CENTER_CD AND A.BILL_SEQ = B.BILL_SEQ(+) ORDER BY A.BILL_DAY ASC
SELECT A.BILL_SEQ, A.BILL_DVSN, A.BILL_NUM, A.BILL_CORP_NAME, A.BILL_ADDR, A.BILL_TEL, A.BILL_USER_ID FROM TSER_BILL_INFO_I A WHERE A.BILL_SEQ = #{billSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TSER_BILL_INFO_I ( BILL_SEQ, BILL_DVSN, BILL_NUM, BILL_CORP_NAME, BILL_ADDR, BILL_TEL, BILL_USER_ID, CENTER_CD, FRST_REGIST_DTM, FRST_REGTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_DTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_SER_BILL.NEXTVAL, #{billDvsn}, #{billNum}, #{billCorpName}, #{billAddr}, #{billTel}, #{billUserId}, #{centerCd}, SYSDATE, #{frstRegterId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{lastUpdusrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TSER_BILL_INFO_I SET BILL_NUM = #{billNum}, BILL_CORP_NAME = #{billCorpName}, BILL_ADDR = #{billAddr}, BILL_TEL = #{billTel}, BILL_USER_ID = #{billUserId}, BILL_DVSN = #{billDvsn}, LAST_UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE BILL_SEQ = #{billSeq}

update.foreach: UPDATE TESR_BILLDAY_INFO_I SET BILL_SEQ = #{item.billSeq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{item.lastUpdusrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE BILLDAY_CD = #{item.billdayCd}
